com.sun.java.browser.dom
Interface DOMAction

public interface DOMAction

Method Summary
 Object run(DOMAccessor accessor)
          When an object implementing interface DOMAction is passed to DOMService.invokeAndWait() or DOMService.invokeLater(), run method is called in the DOM access dispatch thread.
 

Method Detail

run

Object run(DOMAccessor accessor)
When an object implementing interface DOMAction is passed to DOMService.invokeAndWait() or DOMService.invokeLater(), run method is called in the DOM access dispatch thread. accessor is used for the DOMAction to access the entry point of the browser's DOM, if necessary.

Parameters:
accessor - DOMAccessor
